about_the_game:
Prize Pact: A Slot Machine Roguelike


Prize Pact is a satisfying deckbuilder where you spin high-stakes slot machines, uncover game-changing wild symbols, and trigger outrageous combinations. Navigate through a world of intense gambling, where each spin could be your last, and every jackpot has the potential to alter your destiny. Strategically build your deck with unique slot reels, each offering distinct advantages and hazards, as you strive to outsmart the house and win big.

embrace the Thrill Of the Spin!

Key Features:

Callenge Runs: Complete challenge runs at varying difficulities and different combinations of icons and stickers.

High-Stakes Slot Machines: Experience the thrill of spinning slot machines with each roll presenting a new challenge and opportunity.

Deckbuilding Mechanics: Strategically build your deck with unique icons, each offering distinct advantages and hazards.

Stickers: Buy and collect stickers to customize your strategy and enhance your chances of winning.

Intense Gambling World: Navigate through a world of intense gambling where each decision can bring you closer to fortune or ruin.

Electrifying Roguelike Adventure: Embrace the unpredictability and excitement of a roguelike journey where every spin can change your fate.


Dive into Prize Pact and test your luck and strategy in this unique and captivating slot machine roguelike. Will you outsmart the house and hit the ultimate jackpot?

name: Prize Pact

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Prize Pact is a thrilling deckbuilder where you spin high-stakes slot machines, discover game-changing wild symbols, and trigger outrageous combinations. Build your deck with unique reels, outsmart the house, and chase the ultimate jackpot in this electrifying roguelike adventure!
